servingSoon.title: Agentic Playwright Framework with AI-Powered Testing
servingSoon.description: Master modern test automation with Playwright, TypeScript, and AI-driven testing. Build intelligent frameworks with agentic coding and root cause analysis.

comingUpNext.title: Build QA AI agents with n8n
comingUpNext.description: Learn to build intelligent QA automation agents using n8n workflow automation. Create AI-powered testing assistants that can analyze, execute, and report on test results autonomously.

comingUpNext.title: QA Infrastructure for Test Engineers
comingUpNext.description: Build and manage robust testing infrastructure. Learn CI/CD integration, test environments, reporting systems, and scalable automation architectures for enterprise QA teams.

comingUpNext.title: Web Security Testing 101
comingUpNext.description: Master the fundamentals of web application security testing. Learn common vulnerabilities, OWASP Top 10, security testing tools, and best practices for identifying and reporting security issues.
